body: The cost of this task is **1 hour** (this is exactly how much will be paid, not less not more) when the task is done
@yegor256 can you please help? Keep in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles)
@yegor256 we're waiting for your feedback, please keep us posted on your progress
@yegor256 please stop working with this task immediately, thanks
@olezhik can you please help? Keep in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). If you have any technical questions, don't hesitate to ask right here
Is there any place where I can read a bit about the project, its structure?

Well, there is not so much to say, it's a Github SDK on top of RESTful API provided by Github. We're listed there, take a look: http://developer.github.com/libraries/

More details about the API itself you can find here: http://developer.github.com/v3/

Keep in mind, that if you find something unclear in our source code - you can submit a ticket about it. And if the question will be valid, you will get 15mins for it. So, all questions are welcome. Don't hesitate to criticize what you see :)
One more question, can I use git for this project as it's already on github(fork and send pull request)?
Of course, fork it to your own account, make changes and submit pull request. See this for explanations: http://www.tpc2.com/post/51555961733/github
@olezhik stop where you are, the task is not yours any more, thanks!
@cyberone please go ahead, it's your task now, keep [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) in mind, and don't hesitate to ask any technical questions you may have
Hello @dmarkov, there are some maven dependency problems, sould they be commited to master?

@cyberone if you have any problems - report them in separate tickets (see http://www.tpc2.com/post/68251068225/team-work-principles). Don't try to fix them yourself, report them and someone will help you.
@yegor256 @dmarkov just started with wrong maven version, sorry for starting as a dumb.
